title: Brand Consultancies..
content:
Hello, Fellow, Typophiles..   
   
I am seeking names of, and links to, branding / naming / corporate id consultancies, worldwide..   
( Or, maybe even better, links to ( freely accessable ) brand design related resources and directories.. )   
   
And, I am really thankful for every single name dropped or link shared.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Thank you..
author: Dav

comments.content:
Thanks, Marius, looks interesting..   
( I think I am going to register there to look closer.. )

Some of the big boys:   
   
 [Landor](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.landor.com/)   
 [Pentagram](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.pentagram.com/)   
 [Interbrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.interbrand.com/)   
 [FutureBrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.futurebrand.com/)   
 [MetaDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.metadesign.com/)   
 [TrueBrand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.truebrand.com/)   
 [Wolf Olins](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.wolff-olins.com/)   
   
This is a nice [resource](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.identityworks.com/) for all kinds of branding information.

Thanks a lot, Alexander, for these links..   
( Some of those names were already on my list.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
_( Smaller ones and brand related design bureaus are welcome too, of course.. )_

if you are looking for brand design related resources and directories, this one might be interesting:   
 [Corporate Identity Portal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.ci-portal.de/02_recherche_man.html) (German/English)

if you are looking for brand design related resources and directories, this one might be interesting:   
 [Corporate Identity Portal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.ci-portal.de/02_recherche_man.html) (German/English)

if you are looking for brand design related resources and directories, this one might be interesting:   
 [Corporate Identity Portal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017131800/http:/www.ci-portal.de/02_recherche_man.html) (German/English)
